row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.CALL.GET_SHARED_ERROR
row.description: Executed when a request to the backend fails to inform the user

row.process: :ADD_ATT RECIPIENT, "&$USER#/&$DEPARTMENT#" !get error from report :SET &ERROR# = "Unknown" :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#,"REP","Error:*","COL=DELIMITER", "DELIMITER=*Error:*") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &ERROR# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : PRINT "Error: &ERROR#" :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#

row.subject: Error requesting data from the analytics backend
row.content:
Error: &ERROR#
Please check the report of &$ACTIVATOR# with the run id: &$ACTIVATOR_RUNID# to get the error details.
Make sure the analytics agent is able to connect to the analytics backend and that all other connection settings when executing PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PUB.ACTION.ANALYTICS_CONFIGURATION are valid.
